title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Education and Skills (Alteration of
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Education and Skills (Alteration of 

Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 22 October 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited education skill (alteration name department title minister) order 2020 (2) order come operation 22 october 2020

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in
text_raw:
2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in 
the Irish language, An Roinn Oideachais agus Scileanna and, in the English 
language, the Department of Education and Skills, is altered, in the Irish 
language, to that of an Roinn Oideachais and, in the English language, to that of 
the Department of Education.
text_norm: 2 name department state present name irish language roinn oideachais agus scileanna english language department education skill altered irish language roinn oideachais english language department education

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, whose
text_raw:
3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, whose 
present title is, in the Irish language, an tAire Oideachais agus Scileanna and, in 
the English language, the Minister for Education and Skills, is altered, in the 
Irish language, to that of an tAire Oideachais and, in the English language, to 
that of the Minister for Education.
text_norm: 3 title minister charge department state whose present title irish language taire oideachais agus scileanna english language minister education skill altered irish language taire oideachais english language minister education

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: In any enactment or instrument made under an enactment -
text_raw:
4. 

In any enactment or instrument made under an enactment - 

(a) 

(b) 

references to the Department of Education and Skills shall be 
construed as references to the Department of Education; 

references to the Minister for Education and Skills shall be 
construed as references to the Minister for Education. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 23rd October, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [450] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

20 October, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
